title: Rick Riordan - Percy Jackson, Heroes of Olympus, Kane Chronicles
description:
The Tres Navarre books are the only ones that are my rips.  There are quite a few more available in that series and I will continue to upload them individually as I acquire them.  My thanks to the original uploaders of the rest of the files.  It took multiple searches using different key words to find all of these so I thought I would upload a single torrent with everything together for convenience.  

This torrent contains:

Kane Chronicles:

1 - The Red Pyramid
2 - The Throne of Fire
3 - The Serpent's Shadow

Perchy Jackson and the Olympians

1 The Lightning Thief
2 The Sea of Monsters
3 The Titan's Curse
4 The Battle of the Labyrinth
5 The Last Olympian

Heroes of Olympus

1 The Lost Hero
2 The Son of Neptune
3 The Mark of Athena
4 The House of Hades

Tres Navarre Mystery (this is an adult contemporary mystery series and not a YA fantasy series like the other 3)

1 Big Red Tequila
2 The Widower's Two-Step



Please seed and most importantly - enjoy!  :)
